data.message: Not regarding messenger and yes I've sent this to your feedback area, and posted on every facebook page - still no reply or answer on how to fix or when it might be fixed... Since you've changed the look of the newsfeed (front page) are you planning on updated the issues? The left side area that is titled "Shortcuts" I have pages in there that I no longer own or manage along with groups that I've left and you can no longer favorite a group to show up in that area. And you can't rearrange the order of the pages you manage or own.
